sentences.sContent: Recent developments are as portentous as the collapse of the Berlin Wall.
sentences.sCn: 最近的事态发展犹如柏林墙的倒塌，让人有一种山雨欲来风满楼的感觉。

synos.tran: 不祥的；预兆的；令人惊讶的

remMethod.val: 来自portent(n. 预兆， 凶兆)

words.tran: 不祥地；有预兆地；盛气凌人地，自负地
前兆；预示；迹象；异常之物

trans.tranOther: showing that something important is going to happen, especially something bad
